data.name: Base64DecodeDescription
data.value: Decodes a piece of Base64 encoded text.

data.name: Base64DecodeHelp
data.value: Usage: - base64decode ZGVjb2RlIHRoaXM= - base64decode --input ZGVjb2RlIHRoaXM= --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - base64decode --inputFile "C:\tmp\input.txt" --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt"

data.name: Base64EncodeDescription
data.value: Encodes a piece of text or a file to a Base64 string.

data.name: Base64EncodeHelp
data.value: Usage: - base64encode encode this - base64encode --input encode this --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - base64encode --inputFile "C:\tmp\input.txt" --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt"

data.name: FromMimeDescription
data.value: Checks a given MIME type and finds all corresponding file extensions.

data.name: Md5Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to an MD5 hash.

data.name: Md5Help
data.value:
Usage: - md5 hash this - md5 --input hash this --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - md5 --inputFile "C:\tmp\input.txt" --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - md5 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the MD5 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: Sha1Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to a SHA1 hash.

data.name: Sha1Help
data.value:
Usage: - sha1 hash this - sha1 --input hash this --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - sha1 --inputFile "C:\tmp\input.txt" --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - sha1 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the MD5 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: Sha256Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to a SHA256 hash.

data.name: Sha256Help
data.value:
Usage: - sha256 hash this - sha256 --input hash this --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - sha256 --inputFile "C:\tmp\input.txt" --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - sha256 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the SHA256 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: Sha384Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to a SHA384 hash.

data.name: Sha384Help
data.value:
Usage: - sha384 hash this - sha384 --input hash this --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - sha384 --inputFile "C:\tmp\input.txt" --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - sha384 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the SHA384 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: Sha512Description
data.value: Encodes a piece of text to a SHA512 hash.

data.name: Sha512Help
data.value:
Usage: - sha512 hash this - sha512 --input hash this --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - sha512 --inputFile "C:\tmp\input.txt" --outputFile "C:\tmp\output.txt" - sha512 --input hash this --hmac secret-key
Optional properties: - hmac: the signature key for the SHA512 hash - outputType: how the string should be generated (should be 'hex' or 'base64')

data.name: ToMimeDescription
data.value: Converts a given file extension or file name to the corresponding MIME type.
